Key Match Events: Mookie Betts hit a 3-run home run in the 10th inning to secure a 6-2 victory for the Dodgers
Shohei Ohtani laced an RBI triple in his first game back at Angel Stadium since departing as a free agent and signing with the Dodgers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a rematch between the two Los Angeles teams
The Dodgers won 2 straight games over the Angels
Others: The game was played at Angel Stadium in Anaheim, CA
The game was broadcast on SNLA and BSW
